    • Method Detail

      • getTable

        public Table getTable(int sizeOfPax,
                      java.util.Date start,
                      java.util.Date end)
        Returns a table which is able to be reserved during the starting time until the ending time. If there are multiple tables, the one with the smallest capacity of at least sizeOfPax is choosen.
        Parameters:
        sizeOfPax - Number of seats required on the table.
        start - The starting time of booking.
        end - The ending time of booking.
        Returns:
        The table that fits the requirements.

      • allocate

        public boolean allocate(Table which,
                        java.lang.String fullName,
                        java.lang.String contactNo,
                        int sizeOfPax,
                        java.util.Date start,
                        java.util.Date end)
        Allocate that table to the customer.
        Parameters:
        which - Reference to the table.
        fullName - Full name of the customer (case-sensitive).
        contactNo - Contact number of the customer (case-sensitive).
        sizeOfPax - Number of seats required.
        start - Starting time of booking.
        end - Ending time of booking.
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful.

      • getReservation

        public java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> getReservation(java.lang.String fullName,
                                                       java.lang.String contactNo)
        Returns the customer's existing reservations on all tables.
        Parameters:
        fullName - The full name of the customer (case-sensitive).
        contactNo - The contact number of the customer (case-sensitve).
        Returns:
        List of reservations of that customer.
